attributes.action: Put the final deal for Brexit from the European Union to public vote.
attributes.additional_details:
Every person of voting age should be sent a copy either via post or email of the the Final Deal with Brussels, then there should be time of explanation and discussion led not by politicians, but by leaders of different sectors & information TV and radio programmes so that the public can better understand what it is they are voting and what it will mean for the United Kingdom. 

There can be no party sloganeering, the politicians have done their job.  They would only advise their constituents.
attributes.background: The E.U. Referendum was started with a public vote, Scotland wants a second referendum, the British public should have a say on the final deal for Brexit of whether we as a nation want this.
